ul_426933: How to start the Xfce Terminal always maximized in Xfce?
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_426933: Exec=xfce4-terminal --maximize

[Desktop Entry]
NoDisplay=true
Version=1.0
Encoding=UTF-8
Type=X-XFCE-Helper
X-XFCE-Category=TerminalEmulator
X-XFCE-CommandsWithParameter=/usr/bin/xfce4-terminal --maximize -x "%s"
Icon=xfce4-terminal
Name=xfce4-terminal
X-XFCE-Commands=/usr/bin/xfce4-terminal --maximize

WebBrowser=firefox
MailReader=thunderbird
FileManager=Thunar
TerminalEmulator=xfce4-terminal
